snippet.title: Perdita Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Perdita is an atmospheric first person horror game, with focus on dynamic paranormal events, as well as traditional investigation methods.
You are investigating the legend of voodoo priestess Julia Brown and her husband at their old house at Manchac Swamps, Louisiana. the year is 1989. 20 years ago Julia died cursing the whole town, after her death, three hurricanes hit the area. Leaving death and destruction behind.

The game will be released April 28th 2019 on IndieDB, Gamejolt & Itch.io.
Download the full version of Perdita here:
Itch: https://azaxor.itch.io/perdita
IndieDB: https://www.indiedb.com/games/perdita/downloads/perdita-full-version
Gamejolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/Perdita/409220

Official Soundtrack Trailer Composer
Devel Sullivan
https://Twitter.com/SullivanDevel  
https://soundcloud.com/develsullivan

Created by Aza Game Studio.
Follow my Twitter: https://twitter.com/AzaGameStudio
Follow the game here: https://www.indiedb.com/games/perdita
Official site: https://www.azagamestudio.com
